pageContent:
Roja Unnam 
Austin, TX | unnamroja@gmail.com | (305) 205-2137 | LinkedIn: Roja Unnam 
 
Senior MuleSoft Engineer 
  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 
Certified MuleSoft developer with over 10+ years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing integration solutions using 
Mule  ESB  and  Anypoint  Platform.  Proficient  in  building  and  deploying  applications  on-premises  and  on  CloudHub  using  Runtime 
Manager. Solid AWS experience with demonstrated expertise in S3, and SQS. Proven experience working with API-led connectivity, 
data  transformations,  creating  REST  APIs,  and  implementing  security  protocols.  Strong  understanding  of  SOA  and  Agile 
methodologies. 
 
  CORE COMPETENCIES 
 
● MuleSoft ESB & Anypoint Platform 
● RESTful & SOAP Web Services 
● API Design & Management 
● Data Transformation – DataWeave, 
XSLT 
● Security Protocols – OAuth, 
SSL/TLS, SAML, PGP Encryption 
● Messaging Systems – JMS, 
ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, IBM MQ

● API Design & Management 
● Data Transformation – DataWeave, 
XSLT 
● Security Protocols – OAuth, 
SSL/TLS, SAML, PGP Encryption 
● Messaging Systems – JMS, 
ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, IBM MQ 
● Salesforce, SAP, and Database 
Integrations 
 
● Agile & SOA Methodologies 
● CloudHub & Mule Runtime 
Environments

Git 
● MUnit, Integration Testing, 
Smoke Testing 
● Error Handling – Global, 
Choice-Based, Custom 
● API Policies – Rate 
Limiting, Throttling, Client 
ID Enforcement 
 
● XML Technologies – XML, XSD, 
XSLT, XPath, XQuery 
● Version Control – Git, Bitbucket, 
SVN 
● Collaboration & Cross-Functional 
Communication 
● System design and architecture 
● Leadership skills 
● Teamwork 
● Load balancing and scaling 
● Troubleshooting/problem solving 
 
  PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
Sr MuleSoft Developer (Consultant)                                                                                                                           09/20 – Present

Sr MuleSoft Developer (Consultant)                                                                                                                           09/20 – Present 
State of Indiana, Indianapolis, IN 
 
● Led the end-to-end design and implementation of enterprise Mule applications using Mule Runtime 4.x, applying 
API-led connectivity, Enterprise Integration Patterns, and microservices architecture to deliver scalable, reusable, 
and high-performance solutions. 
● Delivered scalable solutions by developing Experience, Process, and System APIs, integrating DataWeave 
transformations, global error handling, and reusable assets published to Anypoint Exchange. 
● Designed and developed asynchronous and synchronous Mule flows, supporting event-driven architecture and 
high-throughput data processing. 
● Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and real-time data pipelines integrating Salesforce, PostgreSQL, and

high-throughput data processing. 
● Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and real-time data pipelines integrating Salesforce, PostgreSQL, and 
third-party systems using Mule connectors and DataWeave for advanced transformation logic. 
● Built and optimized integrations using patterns like batch processing, pub/sub, large file handling, system 
synchronization, and reliability patterns for seamless multi-system communication. 
● Developed data synchronization flows between Salesforce and PostgreSQL. 
● Architected and delivered a Webhook-based correspondence automation system, integrating Salesforce, Adobe 
APIs, MuleSoft, and AWS S3 to automate generation and delivery of over 10,000 documents daily, with built-in 
batch tracking, duplicate prevention, and resource cleanup. 
● Designed and deployed custom connectors, shared libraries, and API fragments to Anypoint Exchange, enabling 
enterprise-wide asset reusability and standardization.

● Designed and deployed custom connectors, shared libraries, and API fragments to Anypoint Exchange, enabling 
enterprise-wide asset reusability and standardization. 
● Implemented and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Maven, and Git, supporting versioned deployments, 
and promoting collaborative DevOps practices. 
● Deployed and managed applications on MuleSoft CloudHub, configuring workers, runtime properties, and 
monitoring infrastructure for performance. 
● Applied comprehensive API security policies and governance rules using Anypoint API Manager, including OAuth 
2.0, client ID enforcement, rate limiting, throttling, and custom policies. 
● Implemented PGP encryption for secure messaging in integrations, ensuring confidentiality and integrity of sensitive 
data across systems. 
● Developed a global exception handling framework using Mule’s error handling strategies, along with validation logic

data across systems. 
● Developed a global exception handling framework using Mule’s error handling strategies, along with validation logic 
using the Validation connector, improving system resiliency and maintainability. 
● Administered logging, auditing, and alerting using Splunk, enhancing observability and enabling quick root cause 
analysis across environments. 
● Tuned performance by configuring threading profiles, flow processing strategies, and optimizing DataWeave scripts 
to reduce memory and CPU usage in high-load scenarios.

● Diagnosed and resolved critical issues including PDF callback delays, S3 access latency, and batch job failures, 
ensuring business continuity and SLA adherence. 
● Collaborate cross-functionally with DevOps, QA, Business Analysts, and Architects to translate business 
requirements into scalable technical solutions. 
 
MuleESB Integration Developer (Consultant)                                                                                                               01/16 – 08/20 
Hertz Corporation, Estero, FL

MuleESB Developer                                                                                                                                                         01/14 – 12/14 
AER Technologies, Tamil Nadu, India 
 
● Followed Agile development methodology, facilitating collaboration, iterative delivery, and continuous integration. 
● Designed integration solutions using Mule ESB 3.5.x, focusing on service-oriented architecture (SOA).

● Designed integration solutions using Mule ESB 3.5.x, focusing on service-oriented architecture (SOA). 
● Built and deployed Mule applications using Anypoint Studio (early version) with XML-based configuration. 
● Developed SOAP and RESTful web services using Mule ESB. 
● Used Mule Expression Language (MEL) and XSLT for routing and transforming data between systems. 
● Integrated systems using Mule-supported connectors such as HTTP, JMS, JDBC, File, FTP/SFTP, and SMTP. 
● Created Mule flows to process and transform data from external systems into Oracle 11g using JDBC. 
● Migrated integrations from IBM Cast Iron to Mule ESB, replicating functionality and improving performance. 
● Managed application deployments and monitoring through Mule Management Console (MMC). 
● Consumed and published messages via ActiveMQ and RabbitMQ using JMS. 
● Developed synchronous and asynchronous Mule flows to support request-response and one-way communication patterns.

● Consumed and published messages via ActiveMQ and RabbitMQ using JMS. 
● Developed synchronous and asynchronous Mule flows to support request-response and one-way communication patterns. 
● Created custom Java components and Mule transformers to handle specific business logic and transformation needs. 
● Used Apache Maven for build automation and Git for version control. 
● Designed basic logging and exception handling using Log4j to aid in troubleshooting and maintenance. 
● Deployed applications manually and managed configurations for different runtime environments.
